Package game.dinosaur

Class Pterodactyl

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaur.Dinosaur
game.dinosaur.CarnivoreDinosaur
game.dinosaur.Pterodactyl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
public class Pterodactyl
extends CarnivoreDinosaur
Represents a Carnivore Pterodactyl. Pterodactyls only eat Corpse and fishes in Lakes.
Since:
10/05/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lin Chen Xiang
See Also:
DinosaurStatus, Gender, CarnivoreDinosaur, Dinosaur

    • getNewDinosaur

      public Dinosaur getNewDinosaur()
      Description copied from class: Dinosaur
      Override this for each unique dinosaur so that we can generate a new dinosaur from a dinosaur object Will be useful when a dinosaur lays an egg, we create a new dinosaur and put the dinosaur in there. An egg will still be ticked every turn but since the dinosaur is not referenced by the world yet, its turn will not be processed. The dinosaur will then only be placed onto the map, into the game when the egg successfully hatches. If the egg doesn't hatch and gets destroyed (not referenced anymore), so does the dinosaur.

      This will just run the second constructor, basically. Easier polymorphism.

      Specified by:
      getNewDinosaur in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      creates a new baby Pterodactyl

    • getCorpseHealAmount

    • getMaxFlyingTile

      public int getMaxFlyingTile()
      Description copied from class: Dinosaur
      How long can the dinosaur fly for. Return 0 if cant fly. Override this and give value above 0 to allow a certain dinosaur to fly. Default will be 0 to not let dinosaurs fly.
      Overrides:
      getMaxFlyingTile in class Dinosaur
      Returns:
      Maximum tiles allowed for Pterodactyl to fly across

    • traverseLake

      public void traverseLake​(WaterTile waterTile)
      Describes what happens when Pterodactyl is traversing across this Lake tile. Prints a description if Pterodactyl ate fish, drank water, or both
      Parameters:
      waterTile - the Lake that the Pterodactyl is on

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Pterodactyl's playTurn. First checks if it is on a Lake to eat and drink, then continue with super's playTurn
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class CarnivoreDinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      an Action depending on what happens to it.
